Class RawTables

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.master.ImageWriter
      • tachyon.master.RawTables

  • public class RawTables
extends ImageWriter
    All Raw Table related info in MasterInfo.

    • Method Detail

      • addRawTable

        public boolean addRawTable(int tableId,
                  int columns,
                  ByteBuffer metadata)
                    throws TachyonException
        Add a raw table. It will check if the raw table is already added.
        Parameters:
        tableId - The id of the raw table
        columns - The number of columns in the raw table
        metadata - The additional metadata of the raw table
        Returns:
        true if success, false otherwise
        Throws:
        TachyonException

      • delete

        public boolean delete(int tableId)
        Remove a raw table.
        Parameters:
        tableId - The id of the raw table
        Returns:
        true if success, false otherwise

      • exist

        public boolean exist(int inodeId)
        Test if the raw table exist or not.
        Parameters:
        inodeId - the raw table id.
        Returns:
        true if the table exists, false otherwise.

      • getColumns

        public int getColumns(int tableId)
        Get the number of the columns of a raw table.
        Parameters:
        tableId - the inode id of the raw table.
        Returns:
        the number of the columns, -1 if the table does not exist.

      • getMetadata

        public ByteBuffer getMetadata(int tableId)
        Get the metadata of the specified raw table. It will return a duplication.
        Parameters:
        tableId - The id of the raw table
        Returns:
        null if it has no metadata, or a duplication of the metadata

      • getTableInfo

        public Pair<Integer,ByteBuffer> getTableInfo(int tableId)
        Get the raw table info.
        Parameters:
        tableId - the raw table id.
        Returns:
        if the table exist, null otherwise.

      • updateMetadata

        public void updateMetadata(int tableId,
                  ByteBuffer metadata)
                    throws TachyonException
        Update the metadata of the specified raw table. It will check if the table exists.
        Parameters:
        tableId - The id of the raw table
        metadata - The new metadata of the raw table
        Throws:
        TachyonException

      • writeImage

        public void writeImage(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectWriter objWriter,
              DataOutputStream dos)
                throws IOException
        Description copied from class: ImageWriter
        Write an image to the specified DataOutputStream. Use the specified ObjectWriter.
        Parameters:
        objWriter - The object writer to use
        dos - The target data output stream
        Throws:
        IOException
